snippet.title: Knight Crawlers - Official Trailer [PC]
snippet.description:
Knight Crawlers is a dungeon-crawling action RPG with ragdoll physics combat where you take on the role of a lone crawler struggling to survive the battles that unfold behind every dark portal. Hunt for loot, craft powerful equipment, and head into arenas to battle against other crawlers. Use your weapons and skill cards to fight against the threatening yet charming enemies and bosses throughout the Lost Realms.



Coming to PC in 2022.



--


Wishlist NOW: https://bit.ly/steamcrawlers 
Follow our devlogs: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTnBb2Bb65hKb6Ma3g2J0Rg

Come say hi on Twitter: https://twitter.com/crawlersgame 
Learn more about Knight Crawlers: https://knightcrawlers.game/
